UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS.msg: User not permitted to perform action.

NOT_UPDATED.msg: Changes were unable to be committed to database.

NOT_CREATED.msg: Record could not be created in database.

DUPLICATE_EMAIL.msg: Email address associated with an existing account.

NOT_DELETED.msg: Record could not be removed from database.

NOT_FOUND.msg: Could not find a record matching supplied arguments.

PERMISSIONS_ERROR.msg: Could not establish rights to perform action.

UNSUPPORTED_ACTION.msg: The operation could not be performed on the supplied arguments.

NOT_IMPLEMENTED.msg: No handler has been assigned to this API endpoint.
